#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;

int func(vector<pair<int,int> >v)
{
int ans=0,open=0;
sort(v.begin(),v.end());
vector<pair<int,int> >::iterator j;
for(j=v.begin();j!=v.end();j++)
if(j->second==0)
open++;
else if(j->second==2)
open--;
else if(open)
ans++;
return ans;
}

int main()
{
ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
int n,k;
cin>>n>>k;
int a[n];
vector<pair<int,int> >v;
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
{
cin>>a[i];
v.push_back(make_pair(a[i],1));
}
for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
{
int x,y;
cin>>x>>y;
if(x<y)
{
v.push_back(make_pair(x,0));
v.push_back(make_pair(y,2));
}
else
{
v.push_back(make_pair(x,2));
v.push_back(make_pair(y,0));
}
}
cout<<func(v)<<endl;
return 0;
}
